Text.Value: Why did you steal the druid's idol?
How did you end up in the druids' grove?
*The child is silent. There's no answer to give.*
Leave.
Stop the ritual... I don't want to go...
And your parents? What should I tell them?
And if I meet them? What should I tell them?
Crack in wall... by Mattis and Silfy...
And where can I find Mol?
Who cares... done now...
How did you die?
Don't know... they didn't come...
How did you die?
Do you have any valuables hidden around here?
Your parents should be here. Where are they?
You stole an idol? Why?
Why would a druid kill you?
Elturel... everyone was angry... we ran away...
Arabella... I'm nine and a half...
*The corpse does not stir. It will answer no more questions.*
*The corpse regards you lifelessly.*
Who are you?
Stole idol... said 'sorry'... they were still mad...
*The spell's power wanes. You can ask no more questions.*
Druid's stupid snake... I was just scared...

EditorData.NodeContext: A little defensive on 'I was just scared'

Text.Value: *The corpse seems willing to speak - but not to its killer.*
Not me... Mol...

Synopsis: Arabella is a young thief - a child caught stealing an idol from the druids. She wanted to stop their ritual to protect the refugees in the grove. She likely died during her trial, where the player's inaction led to her getting bitten by a snake.
